page.title: 09Welham Green's industry.
page.content: {Welham Green}has a large industrial estate which stretches north alongside the railway towards Hatfield.The growth of this industrial complex is due to its proximity to London and its excellent position in the network of communications, being close to the M25 and the A1M. The estate houses{light and heavy {engineering works, printers, transport {firms, warehousing facilities and many {smaller concerns. } The largest site of thirty acres is at present occupied by{Mowlem Plant Ltd., but it will be vacated in November of this year. It is uncertain as yet what will happen to the site but Tesco Stores Ltd. have shown an interest. There is 16,000 sq. feet of newly built warehousing to let at present on the estate.There are new premises which belong to Elerthorn Ltd.
